function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible spread of contagious diseases due to lack of attention to facility management and disease control measures","Impact":"Health and safety of individuals at the facility is at risk, and there is a potential for widespread transmission of diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing strict facility management protocols, regular disinfection, and disease control measures","Technologies":"Use of advanced disinfection technologies, IoT-based monitoring systems for crowd control, and contactless systems","People":"Individuals using or working in the facility, facility management staff, visitors","Owner":"Facility management team, health and safety authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Integration of value engineering and project management activities may neglect health and safety considerations, leading to increased risk of contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased spread of contagious diseases due to inadequately designed and managed projects","Mitigation":"Incorporating health and safety considerations in the integration process, conducting thorough risk assessments, and involving health experts in project planning","Technologies":"Integration of health and safety monitoring systems, use of Building Information Modeling (BIM) for spatial analysis and disease control planning","People":"Project managers, engineers, construction workers, health and safety professionals","Owner":"Project management teams, health and safety authorities"},{"Description":"Reliability and consistency of data collection and analysis may overlook the impact of contagious diseases and their influence on project management and value engineering","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of project risks, as contagious diseases are not factored into decision-making processes","Mitigation":"Incorporating disease impact analysis in data collection, conducting specific studies on disease influence, and integrating health data into project risk assessments","Technologies":"Use of data analytics for disease impact modeling, integration of health data interfaces with project management software","People":"Data analysts, project researchers, health experts","Owner":"Research teams, project management experts"}]}
